title: 3 VCs in the hottest area of healthcare explain where they're placing their next bets
text:
Venture-capital firms are increasingly betting that the future of healthcare is high-tech.

But what type of tech, exactly?

To find out, we asked leaders at F-Prime Capital, Echo Health Ventures, and Jumpstart Foundry, three of the most active VCs in the space, about the top trends that they're keeping an eye on.

VCs have poured $3.5 billion into about 371 different digital-health deals and financing companies in the second quarter of this year, and these three firms are among the most active in the space, according to CB Insights.

Read more: VCs just bet $3.5 billion that tech will transform the future of healthcare. These are the top 9 firms making the most digital health investments.
